member.name: T:Acontplus.Utilities.Security.Interfaces.ISensitiveDataEncryptionService
member.summary: Defines asynchronous methods for encrypting and decrypting sensitive data.

member.name: M:Acontplus.Utilities.Security.Interfaces.ISensitiveDataEncryptionService.EncryptToBytesAsync(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Asynchronously encrypts the provided plaintext string using the specified key and returns the encrypted data as a byte array.
member.param: The encryption key (must be 16, 24, or 32 bytes long).
The plaintext string to encrypt.
member.returns: A Task containing a byte array with the IV followed by the encrypted data.

member.name: M:Acontplus.Utilities.Security.Interfaces.ISensitiveDataEncryptionService.DecryptFromBytesAsync(System.String,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Asynchronously decrypts the provided byte array using the specified key and returns the decrypted plaintext string.
member.param: The decryption key (must match the key used for encryption).
The byte array containing the IV followed by the encrypted data.
member.returns: A Task containing the decrypted plaintext string.

member.name: M:Acontplus.Utilities.Security.Services.SensitiveDataEncryptionService.EncryptToBytesAsync(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Encrypts the provided data using AES encryption and returns the encrypted byte array.
member.param: The encryption key (must be 16, 24, or 32 bytes long).
The plaintext data to encrypt.
member.returns: A byte array containing the IV followed by the encrypted data.

member.name: M:Acontplus.Utilities.Security.Services.SensitiveDataEncryptionService.DecryptFromBytesAsync(System.String,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Decrypts the provided byte array using AES encryption and returns the plaintext string.
member.param: The decryption key (must match the key used for encryption).
The byte array containing the IV followed by the encrypted data.
